channel.title: CVE Feed for Blender -- Blender
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Blender -- Blender

item.title: CVE-2017-2901|2024-08-05T14:09:17.700Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the IRIS loading functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. A specially crafted '.iris' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an asset via the sequencer in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12103|2024-08-05T18:28:16.534Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the way that the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c converts text rendered as a font into a curve. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use the file as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2906|2024-08-05T14:09:17.428Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the animation playing functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. A specially created '.avi' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an asset in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2907|2024-08-05T14:09:17.490Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the animation playing functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. A specially created '.avi' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an asset in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12082|2024-08-05T18:28:16.650Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the 'CustomData' Mesh loading functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite. A .blend file with a specially crafted external data file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to edit an object within a .blend library in their Scene in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2900|2024-08-05T14:09:17.390Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the PNG loading functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. A specially crafted '.png' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an asset via the sequencer in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12100|2024-08-05T18:28:16.301Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the 'multires_load_old_dm' functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open a .blend file in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12101|2024-08-05T18:28:16.659Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the 'modifier_mdef_compact_influences' functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open a .blend file in order to trigger this vulnerability.

A specially crafted '.hdr' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an asset via the sequencer in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12086|2024-08-05T18:28:16.342Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the 'BKE_mesh_calc_normals_tessface' functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open a .blend file in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2908|2024-08-05T14:09:17.437Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the thumbnail functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to render the thumbnail for the file while in the File->Open dialog.

An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use it as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12104|2024-08-05T18:28:16.422Z -- blender -- blender

An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use the file as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12081|2024-08-05T18:28:16.360Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the upgrade of a legacy Mesh attribute of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use it as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12099|2024-08-05T18:28:16.202Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the upgrade of the legacy Mesh attribute 'tface' of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use it as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-2905|2024-08-05T14:09:17.509Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the bmp loading functionality of the Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. A specially crafted '.bmp' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an asset via the sequencer in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12105|2024-08-05T18:28:16.263Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the way that the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c applies a particular object modifier to a Mesh. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use the file as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2017-12102|2024-08-05T18:28:16.418Z -- blender -- blender
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the way that the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c converts curves to polygons. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use the file as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.
